price: ߟߍߙߊ ߘߌ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߡߍ߲ ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߒ߬ ߓߟߏ߫ ߊ߬ ߢߍ߫ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߟߊߣߍ߲߫ ߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُمُ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ مِن قَبۡلِهِۦ هُم بِهِۦ يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna ātaynāhumu al-kitāba min qablihi hum bihi yu'minūna
